# Production Validation Artifacts

This directory contains evidence collected during production P0 requirement validation.

## Generated Files:

### Screenshots
- `home-page.png` - Homepage screenshot
- `artists-page.png` - Artists page screenshot  
- `services-page.png` - Services page screenshot
- `contact-page.png` - Contact page screenshot
- `contact-map-loaded.png` - Map in loaded state
- `contact-map-fallback.png` - Map fallback state (if applicable)
- `scroll-demo-*.png` - Scroll behavior evidence

### Data Files
- `events.json` - Captured GA4 analytics events
- `computed_styles.json` - Font weight and typography data
- `network_notes.md` - Network request observations

### Generated by
- Script: `tools/prod_capture.mjs`
- Date: Auto-generated timestamp
- Base URL: Environment variable `BASE_URL`
